name: JIRA Dark (NightShift - eye care - based)
description:
Fork of NightShift - eye care adapted for Atlassian JIRA.

Tested with JIRA 6 and 7.

Click here to raise a bug on GitHub (login required) or just post it below.

NOTE: I found a nice alternative for the whole web, switched to it:
  • Chrome: Dark Reader
  • Firefox: Dark Background and Light Text
    Colors to make it more like Darkula theme:
    • foreground #A9B7C6
    • background #2B2B2B
    • link color: #D9C077
    • visited link #D9C077
    • selection color #214283
additional_info:
RELEASE NOTES:
11-02-2017: Fixed JIRA 7 Agile issues.
21-07-2016: Disabled for regexp(".*jira.*"), only prefix match left.
11-12-2015: Enabled for regexp(".*jira.*")
24-11-2015: Tempo: fixed worklog edit form actions.
24-11-2015: Agile board: fixed chosen quick filters color.
20-11-2015: Agile board: fixed colored straps.
20-11-2015: Test plugin: test status color: darker.
19-11-2015: Test plugin: test status color fixed.
19-11-2015: Dark scrollbars (Thanks https://gist.github.com/devinrhode2/2573411) (not for Firefox)
02-11-2015: Tuned circle-label colors in test plugin.
31-10-2015: Removed fade to white. Test plugin: icons fixed.
21-10-2015: Fixed icons display!

           ʘ‿ʘ

discussions.name: Very nice, I only needed to add my domain
